Class SmartCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • SmartDevice
      • SmartCamera

  • public class SmartCamera
extends SmartDevice

    The SmartCamera class is a subclass of SmartDevice class. It's contains necessary methods and properties for a smart camera.

    See Also:
    SmartDevice

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float filledStorage
      Represents the filled storage of the smart camera.
      float megabyte
      Represents how much storage filled per minute as megabyte during video recording.

      • filledStorage

        public float filledStorage
        Represents the filled storage of the smart camera.

      • megabyte

        public float megabyte
        Represents how much storage filled per minute as megabyte during video recording.
        Its must be a positive float number.

        name - Name of the smart camera. (String)
        megabyte - Filled storage per minute as megabyte during the video recording. (float)
        status - On/Off status of the smart camera. (boolean)
